main_definition: To exist or to occupy a particular place, time, state or condition.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exist in a certain form or condition
meanings_and_examples.example: The sun beats down on the earth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To occupy a specific place or time
meanings_and_examples.example: I will be at home all day tomorrow.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To fulfill or perform a certain role or function
meanings_and_examples.example: As the leader, he must always be in control of his team's decisions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have a particular quality or characteristic
meanings_and_examples.example: She is known to be very generous and kind-hearted.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To exist as oneself, in one's own form or essence
meanings_and_examples.example: We must all strive to always remain true to who we are and what we believe in.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become a certain person over time, often due to experiences or personal growth
meanings_and_examples.example: After years of hard work and determination, he finally became the man he aspired to be.
